title: Bloomberg Markets: Bond Report and Eco Brief for Oct. 20

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Carl Riccadonna\u0010Chief U.S. Economist\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing the economy with Kathleen Hays, Bloomberg News Global Economics and Policy Editor, who also discusses the daily bond report.
